channel.title: CISA KEV Catalog Updates
channel.description: This feed notifies when CISA updates the KEV catalog.

item.title: KEV Catalog Updated: 2025-12-17
item.description: CISA updated the KEV catalog on 2025-12-17. CISA updated the KEV catalog, but no specific CVEs matched the release date.
